{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Skull Fossil |image = [[File:Skull_Fossil.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Skull Fossil''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Skull Fossil''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When an '''Skull Fossil''' is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Cranidos. ==Mine Layout== The Skull appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:SkullFossilMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Skull_Fossil.png|30px]] || [[File:Cranidos.png|40px]] Cranidos |} ==Acquisition== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Underground]]|N/A}} |} |}
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] __NOTOC__
